title: Cinderhella II Beauty Scream
description: Cinderhella returns and no one at prom is safe. At the stroke of midnight, you die.
quote: It was the worst kind of sex… premarital.
altHero: a gauzed and bloody woman wears black rubber gloves and a tiara
alt1: a black rubber gloved hand grabs a tiara
alt2: a teen girl cries with her head constrained in a brace
alt3: Cinderhella shows the girl an x-ray with a visible red high-heeled shoe
alt4: Cinderhella is frightening as she adjusts the girl’s head brace
